title: HPE CTY vs JPMC Code for Good
content: Hey guys, i have managed to get into both hpe cty and jpmc code for good programs. Hpe cty interviews are this month and jpmc code for good hackathon is going to happen next month. I f I perform good at the interview, i will have to decide whether to choose hpe internship and fte or reject it and hope to be selected at jpmc. If anyone has worked in either of the companies please share your suggestions, thanks in advance.

comments.body: Sorry have no idea which is better, but can you check and tell the date on which jpmc sent mails for those who cleared that online interview
bro when was hpe cty project interview completed ?
bro can u provide ur linkedin account ?
